name: Bookstore
details: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Google Books API
description: This is a bookstore project. The user can search for books by title, author, or ISBN. The user can also see the details of the book and add it to the cart.

name: Maze game
description: This is a simple maze game. The player has to find the way out of the maze. The game has 3 levels of difficulty.

name: CSV Visualizer
description: This is a CSV visualizer project. The user can upload a CSV file and see the data in a table. The user can also filter the data by column and see the data in a chart.
